name: Hidden Object - Secret house
description:
You can find all the hidden objects or not? Find hidden objects game is a free game that will challenge your searching skill, you never find anywhere else!
How to play
Find the hidden objects in the scene. The game will provide a desired object. You need to find objects in the time allotted. If you find objects quickly to get a time bonus on the rise. If you can not find a clue that the object will sound and vibration. Find objects within the time limit!
You'll find all the objects quickly and accurately. If you want to make a reduction. You also can choose the level of difficulty with (easy, medium, hard and icons).

So if you're fed up with traditional games, this game is the answer for you.
Let's play and have fun finding your friends.

Game Features
- Objects that are beautifully designed and challenging.
- Very easy to play for all ages.
- Music and Sound in the game is great.
- Not need Internet to play this game.
- Tested on all Iphone and Ipad.
- You can play this game for free in all modes.
